import React from 'react' const MODAL_STYLES = { position: 'fixed', top: '50%', left: '50%', transform: 'translate(-50%, -50%)', backgroundColor: '#FFF', padding: '50px', zIndex: 1000 } const OVERLAY_STYLES = { position: 'fixed', top: 0, left: 0, right: 0, bottom: 0, backgroundColor: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, .7)', zIndex: 1000 } export default function Modal({ open, children, onClose }) { if (!open) return null render( <>
{children}
, document.getElementById('portal') ) }
